description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. A huge open-world game where you have the freedom to play how you want - but your choices have consequences.  You've survived the zombie apocalypse by living in a bunker for a year and now it's time to venture out.  Scavenge for supplies, find other survivors, trade or fight with them, form relationships and build a community.  Go on quests, face moral dilemmas, and uncover dark, terrible secrets!
